history.proof: intros Huv Hu. apply is_lim_seq_ext_loc with (u := u). - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: is_lim_LimSup_seq, is_lim_LimInf_seq. - auto.

exceptions.exn: In environment u, v : nat -> R l : Rbar Huv : forall n : nat, u n = v n Hu : is_lim_seq u l Unable to unify "u ?M2368 = v ?M2368" with "exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> (fun n0 : nat => u n0 = v n0) n".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment u, v : nat -> R l : Rbar Huv : forall n : nat, u n = v n Hu : is_lim_seq u l Unable to unify "match ?M2369 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ l - eps < ?M2368 n) /\\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> ?M2368 n < l + eps) | p_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ M < ?M2368 n | m_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> ?M2368 n < M end" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally l P -> filtermap u eventually P".

original: intros Huv Hu. apply is_lim_seq_ext_loc with (u := u). - intros n. apply Huv. - apply is_lim_LimSup_seq, is_lim_LimInf_seq with (u := u). auto. apply is_LimInf_seq_unique, Hu.
